ags:resource.dc:title: UPDATED STANDARDIZED JOINT CPUE INDEX FOR BLUEFIN TUNA (THUNNUS THYNNUS) CAUGHT BY MOROCCAN AND SPANISH TRAPS FOR THE PERIOD 1981- 2011
ags:resource.dc:subject: Marcado, marcado electrónico, atún rojo, Estrecho de Gibraltar, cebo vivo,pesquerías artesanales
ags:resource.dc:description: Relative abundance indices of bluefin tuna (Thunnus thynnus) caught by the Moroccan and Spanish traps in the area close to the Strait of Gibraltar were estimated for the period 1981- 2011. Standardized CPUEs were estimated through a General Linear Modeling (GLM) approach under a negative binomial error distribution assumption.
ags:resource.dc:identifier: ICCAT Collective Volume of Scientific Papers, SCRS-2012/103. 2013: 235-239
